name: CreateBlogTag
description:
Create a new blog tag in HubSpot CMS.

This tool creates a new tag for a blog in the HubSpot CMS. It should be called when there's a need to categorize or organize content within the blog by creating new tags.

parameters.name: deletion_timestamp
parameters.description: The ISO8601 timestamp marking when the blog tag was deleted.

value_schema.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog Tag was deleted.

parameters.name: creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog Tag was created. Leave empty if not applicable.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: The name for the new blog tag to be created in HubSpot CMS.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: The explicit ISO 639 language code for the tag, such as 'en' for English or 'es' for Spanish.

value_schema.description: The explicitly defined ISO 639 language code of the tag.

parameters.name: blog_tag_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID assigned to the Blog Tag.

value_schema.description: The unique ID of the Blog Tag.

parameters.name: primary_tag_translation_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the primary tag that this tag was translated from.

value_schema.description: ID of the primary tag this object was translated from.

parameters.name: updated_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when the Blog Tag was last updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: deletedAt
parameters.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog Tag was deleted.

value_schema.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog Tag was deleted.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The explicitly defined ISO 639 language code of the tag.

value_schema.description: The explicitly defined ISO 639 language code of the tag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Blog Tag.

value_schema.description: The unique ID of the Blog Tag.

parameters.name: translatedFromId
parameters.description: ID of the primary tag this object was translated from.

value_schema.description: ID of the primary tag this object was translated from.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
